text:
RECEIVED
RADIO STATION
MEMORANDUM
NOV 25 8 48 Ail 1957
November 22, 1957
To1 Those Att
p. NAEB Board of Directors Meeting*
Board of Directors:
Richard Hull
Jack McBride
Robert Coleman
Arthur Weld
Vernon Bronson
Ola Hiller
Richard A. Vogl
Robert Schenkkan
Edwin Adams
Frank E0 Schooley 1/
Gertrude Broderick
Se cretary-Elect
Haskell Boyter
Permanent Financing Committee
James Miles
William Harley
Edward Rosenheim
Chairmans Professional Advancement Committee
Earl Wynn
Community Station Representative (chosen by Chairman
Harley of the ETRC Affiliates Committee)
James Robertson
Executive Director
Harry J. Skomia
From: Burton Paulu
The special Board meeting will be held at the Del Prado
Hotel in Chicago on Friday, Saturday and Sunday, December 6. 7
and 8. We shall convene (in a meeting room to be announced; at
9*00 a„m„ on December 6* We should plan on morning, afternoon
and evening sessions on the 6th and 7th, on morning and afternoon
sessions on the 8th. I hope we can adjourn in midafternoon on
the 8th« (In addition. If necessary, members of the Foundations
and Permanent Financing Committees should be available for a
meeting on the evening of December 8 and morning of the 9th to
work on details of NAEB*s foundation requests.)
